body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Cast Garruk, Caller of Beasts (4GG)
2. use his +1 ability several turns
3. use his -7 ability at 8 loyality counters (that's what I did)
4. Cast a summon spell (paying the mana cost, not like Quicksilver Amulet or Elvish Piper)
5. you'll not get the opportunity to search your library for a creature card What is the expected output? What do you see instead? I tried several summons, always the same outcome. The summons were:
Ageless Entity, Ajani's Pridemate, Soul Warden What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Linux Mint 16 (Petra), magarena 1.48.823 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). I'd like to, but google notes: Issue attachment storage quota exceeded. Please provide any additional information below. I uploaded the game.log to dropbox. It's the last game, way down to the eof. https://www.dropbox.com/s/lsz45xn7clkot64/game.log btw. Thanks alot for this magnificent piece of software.
